prompts.image_prompt: A wide, dramatic shot inside a richly detailed, candlelit Papal bedchamber (Vatican interior, 13th-century style). A corpulent older catfolk protagonist (white fur, ginger tabby markings, long gray mustache) in rich crimson and gold Papal robes is slumped dramatically, deceased, on a massive, ornate bed, surrounded by shocked Cardinal catfolk. The atmosphere is tense and solemn. Retro 16-bit pixel art, visible pixels, limited palette, cinematic lighting. No text, no letters, no numbers, no signage, no subtitles, no UI.
prompts.video_prompt: Same scene, Papal bedchamber, immediate aftermath of death. Slow, soft downward tilt camera movement, revealing the full extent of the tragedy. Strong 2.5D parallax shift between the ornate bedposts (foreground) and the shocked faces of the Cardinal catfolk (midground). Dynamic light flickers intensely from the abundant candles, casting moving shadows. Micro-animations: The protagonist's Papal robes slightly settle, a nearby Cardinal nervously shifts his weight and his tail twitches slightly, visible particles of dust illuminated by candlelight. Loopable. A corpulent older catfolk protagonist (white fur, ginger tabby markings, long gray mustache) is slumped, his hand twitches once on the silk blanket in a final, dying spasm, then relaxes. Retro 16-bit pixel art. No text, no letters, no numbers, no signage, no subtitles, no UI.

prompts.image_prompt: A dramatic, low-angle shot of the corpulent older catfolk protagonist (white fur, ginger tabby markings, long gray mustache) in crimson robes, head thrown back, mouth slightly open in a silent, violent spasm. No text, no letters, no numbers, no signage, no subtitles, no UI.
prompts.video_prompt: Same low-angle, intense focus on the first violent hiccup. Micro-animations: Sweat drips from his brow, his ears flatten back in distress, and his robes slightly ripple from the force. Loopable. The corpulent older catfolk protagonist throws his head back violently in a sharp, sudden hiccup spasm, holds the tension briefly, and then relaxes only to repeat the violent jerk. prompts.image_prompt: A gloomy, dimly lit private chapel or study. His head is bowed, but his posture is contorted, suggesting he is fighting an internal physical force. Extreme exhaustion is visible on his face. prompts.video_prompt: Same gloomy chapel setting, showing the continuous torment. Slow, creeping lateral pan (left to right) across the scene. Micro-animations: Dust motes drift in the faint light, the protagonist's shoulders shake constantly, and his hands grip the kneeler tightly. Loopable.
